description.value: `Observation.context` and `MedicationRequest.context` have been renamed and remodeled in R4 to only contain a reference to Encounter. `MedicationStatement.context` and `MedicationAdministration.context` are a 0..1 reference to Encounter|EpisodeOfCare. This extension allows to add a reference to EpisodeOfCare (potentially next to a reference to an Encounter). From R5 onwards, this extension will likely be replaced by a HL7 core extension.

purpose.value: This extension provides a generic method to add a reference to an EpisodeOfCare resource.

definition.value: Identifies the episode(s) of care that this resource is relevant to. Establishes the EpisodeOfCare as a 'grouper' of resources that are relevant to that episode.
